Hi James,

I'm using JDK 1.4.2, and it seems that I don't have a choice to =

upgrade JDK because GWT relies on a JDK version <=3D 1.4.2. GWT 
translate=
s Java to JavaScript, and the source files (or class files) 
must correpson=
d to JDK 1.4.2 or earlier. Given this, it seems that 
JUnit 4.x is compiled=
 with JDK 5+. Is there a way I can re-compile 
JUnit 4.x (safely), and stil=
l be able to use it (and all its 
features, like Hamcrest) with JDK 1.4.2 (=
except for annotations...)?

Regards,
Will
